title: Jessie2121
author: Jessie2121
content: My fellow brodas and sistas, I salute una. Abeg wetin we no go hear for this country as we dy so? Our presido com out say make we pray for the country as e be so, I no understand again. Nah any president wey enter sit go say make we dy always pray for country we them don use their hands spoil finish? Or them no know say people don start this prayer for long? If them dey chop the money them no go ask us to pray so how this prayer wan take help us? Naija nah the only country wey need prayers as e be. WetinÂ  presido don do to make change happen in a positive way? We go dy pray for better for the country them go dy make life hard for us, see dollar don climb skyscraper and I believe say some of us dy follow the raise of am so with all this things and some other Yama Yama wey dy go on for this country e still make sense as president talk say make we pray for the country? No be say e no good to pray but our presido need to remind us?Abeg make una talk something, cos me I weak like this for things I gather to talk... Good morning naija!!!

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Lolz, that one choke you abi? But as presido talk e good sha because nah only by God grace nai this country go take better, although some done they pray for long long time ago, say make this country better but still e never better but make we still dey hope on to God Grace.Some days ago, one man for my street talk say the more churches dey plenty for this country nah the more corruption they increase, but I no really understand why the man talk like that and I no even care to ask am the reasons.So this country so nah only God nai go fit help us, I know say many citizens and churches done pray tire but make we no give up. Another thing be say, as we they pray to @baba God to show grace to this corrupt nation the leaders self no they show Working say them really want the county to better, so e just dey like say our prayers nah waste.

comments.body: LolYou dey sound like say you just come back from another country because if you dey this country, you no suppose let any of this things shock you because as a Nigerian, you supposed don dey very used to this things and one of the one wey burst my head na the one wey presido come talk about the hardship and meh, I just and conclude say our hope truly don finish and truly na only prayer we truly need for this country because nothing pass God.Arise oh compatriots, Nigeria's call obey bit I no dey Seve any father land ogbene. comments.body: I be wan ask you, say na Nigeria you dey with us abi you just arrived? Nothing we no fit see for our country na, we sef Don master am, because this thing's start now no be today, this kind thing dey. Sup for Nigeria now no be today so even if the president say make we go pray, It will not be a new thing to us again, maybe things Don pass Mr president power that is why he said we should be praying, but for me I don't even have stress to pray for any country now because I never chop finish, na person wey dey see food chop any how dey pray for him country.Everything for Nigeria now na cruise, because how president wey we suffer vote for go dey beg us for prayer wey be say na him supposed to make things better, this days no funny I swear because if he funny thing's no go dey sup like this, but we should all know that sometimes Mr president no get power on his own because as Nigeria dey like this we get some idiots elders wey be say anything wey dey talk like this na him people dey follow and even Mr president no get power to talk about it.

Good morning naija!!!In as much as I know we are the architects of our failures. Though we need God to intervene at this critical time but just the bible says that faith without work is useless so how can we be expecting God to answer our prayers when we no do anything that will back up the prayers? For me o the kingdom of God suffers violence and the violent ones took it by force, so if we know wake up now and hijack our destiny by force it will be a very big disaster to our upcoming generation. We need to hold the bull by the horn, that is, do the right thing at the right time before we seek for manners from heaven. No farmer wey dey go harvest for where him no sow and anything wey person so na in him go reap even if you no reap am directly at least you have loved ones, relatives, children so your actions may affect these people one wey or the other so if it troubles them it will also backfire back to you. Make we remove sentiments and work selflessly towards the betterment of our society. So definitely we need prayer but make e be say we don put something for ground before we dey expect miracle. Na the duty of you and I to redirect our selfish path and embrace a lifestyle worthy of emulation. If we no do wellÂ  e go dey hard for our children to remember us tomorrow because na person wey do dem dey remember

Because na the only thing we get to hold onto, make we dey happy say our president don talk am say make we dey pray for country, this one show say he is willing to do good, and make we all know say only him no fit do am and our contribution na to dey pray for him to make am good. I want make we no say na God go answer all the prayer wey we dey pray and make we have faith say him go answer our prayers. We should have believe that things go change from worse to better, we should not give up no matter the circumstances we are facing now.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Well, not like it's a bad thing to pray, "pray for the peace of Jerusalem" is something that is written in the Bible, the Jerusalem the bible is referring to can be or mean anywhere for any body, for some, it could be their family, while for some, it could be their community, for others, it could be their state and while for the majority, it's their country.So it's never out of place to pray, even the Bible said, men ought to pray always..It's just that we have been praying, but we have demonic leaders who know nothing about prayer, the Bible asked a question saying "can two work together except they agree?" it simply means, we as citizens can pray, but until our leaders join us in the same prayer, and start doing what is right, our prayers may never be answered.

comments.body: Bible make me believe say prayers Na the master key. Just like our senior oga Â talk here say Bible say make we "pray for the peace of Jerusalem" . So my country people if Jesus himself wey be son of God start with prayers and also end with prayers. we too go need pray na. Naija Na our own country home, we need peace and harmony, unity and progress. Orderliness and coordination. Synergy and cooperation all these are the reasons why we need to pray for our very own country. Abi we like as our country dey restless, chaotic, and increasingly economic inflation? The answer is no. So therefore it is a call for prayer that would make things go well. Even all other religion do pray so why can't Christians pray as well.

Good morning naija!!!My oga, the country don almost turn upside-down o. We sha no go lose hope on top of the country because na our home country be this. Before this regime,plenty regimes don pass including during the military services. All if you factor dem together con recollect the struggles and tussles wey we don undergo, you fit come into conclusion say, na serious and deep prayers we need. And it has to be intentional and collectively.I'm pretty sure that's what the president is buttressing on. We have been stagnant as a nation and have a very long way to go. The expectations and burdens on us as rhe giant of Africa and the different corrupt cases wey dey happen on daily basis. E reach make we enter serious prayers o. One thing wey i like na the mentioning wey mr president mention am say make we help am, help ourselves with prayers. And as of the need to remind us. Yes. Our presido need remind us o because if you dey look for environment where dem dey injure people pass, hypocritically, na Nigerians. That's why dem talk say change begins with me and you. As far as we continue to sabotage the efforts of the government, we won't prosper as a nation. Instead, let's join into prayers.

comments.body: My dear e get some talk way you go hear for this our obodo Nigeria your head go they pain you, how our presido go say make we pray for our obodo Nigeria way na them they in charge for all the looting, corruption and embezzlement and even the bokoharam na some of the government personnel they sponsor them, so how prayer go take solve am, omo the problem self way they this country self prayers no fit solve am because even if say we pray against the government nothing go change.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: Prayer is good, and its better accompanied by good works. Its not wrong for him to ask for prayers, my problem is simply the intention of the request. is he having a positive mindset or is it just for the media to consume. The thing tire me as politicians don see asking for prayers as a means ofÂ  validating their inability to deliver on their mandate. We are praying, God is answering, but I believe that what you can do for yourself or for others, you don't need to ask for prayers to do it. You should allow God use you to answer others prayers and that's what is expected of him as the president. He's been elevated to the position, why not him use his good office to provide the answer to the prayers of people. If he's ruling properly, he doesn't even need to ask for prayers cos people go dey remember am and em activities for prayers wella as em dey favor them.

Pray for this one, pray for that one.Now, the person wey the general affairs of the country dey e hand say make we pray for the country in general. Hope still dey like this? I no talk say prayer no good but that talk wey president talk no be solution. Oyibo people wey bring this their religion come give us no dey pray as we dey pray sef. The country and our leaders no balance na why we dey cast and bind everytime. Na why dem dey talk say "once person japa from Nigeria, e prayer life go reduce".
